title: Accelerating the decarbonisation of industry
author: unknown
text:
You are here Accelerating the decarbonisation of industry 7 Feb 2023  

 

 Following trilogue discussions on the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) and EU Emissions Trading System (EU ETS), there are now provisional agreements that will transform the legislative landscape for environmental measures within the EU. Policy-makers and businesses must now look ahead to the transition period for CBAM, beginning in October 2023. Join us on Tuesday, 28 February for a discussion on the next steps for the proposal and how US industry committed to Europe can contribute to decarbonisation efforts on both sides of the Atlantic.
